website_summaries.verdict: This dual-probe Kitchen Thermometer is expensive, but you can trust it to turn out perfectly prepared food with little to no effort on your part.
pros: The iDevices Kitchen Thermometer and companion app take oven-hovering out of your cooking equation by alerting you when your food reaches an optimal temperature
cons: The app has plenty of useful features, but it isn't particularly well designed

customer_reviews.title: Paid for two probes, but only one works
customer_reviews.text: If I could give zero starts I would. This thermometer worked great...until it didn't. One probe still functions, but the second probe reads ridiculous temperatures - e.g., 105 degrees for room temperature (when the first probe reads -- correctly -- a comfortable 70 degrees). We've switched out the two thermometers and the base is not the problem - it appears to be the second probe. This is my second iDevices thermometer, and I was so hopeful that this one was going to be better than the last. It's a great concept, but the quality just isn't there. At this point, I'm just waiting for the first probe to fail.
customer_reviews.author: WrkngGal

customer_reviews.title: My Advice on The iDevice
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why for years I have allowed myself to worry if the meat I am cooking is JUST RIGHT. You don't need a college degree to figure out if your food is cooked perfectly. Just an iDevice. I use to probe the meat several times upon the finishing cooking process which works, but you watch all the juices from the meat escape when you remove the probe. And it's always a guessing game as to when to start the other dishes you plan on serving with the meat. With this device, you gets results throughout the whole cooking period allowing better meal planning. The device works great and makes me a champion when cooking meats of all types.
customer_reviews.author: Bbqsmoke

customer_reviews.title: temperature is wrong
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice device, was a little hard to figure out, but once I got the correct software, it connected to my phone and that made it easier to control and see the temperatures. Now that I have used it, I now have a problem with one of the probes. One probe reads 80 the other 135 and its only 80 in my house. Doesn't matter what port I plug the probes into the high temp follows the same probe.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This was the best thing we have ordered!!!!! :) We ordered this for Thanksgiving to do our turkey. Downloaded the app and we watch the temp on our phones. Once the turkey came to the right temp, an alarm went off on the phone. The plastic ones that are in the turkey don't worked and made our turkey dry. When the Idevice came to the right temp the plastic thing in the turkey didn't pop. The turkey was so moist. We just recently used it for our pork roast and turned out great. We will use this for all of our cooking for now on.
customer_reviews.author: MJD

customer_reviews.title: Overall I like it. I had one probe go bad in ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it. I had one probe go bad in like 4 days and they sent me a new one. Sometimes it won't reconnect with my phone and so I have to reset it during the cook (so far this hasn't cost me a destroyed brisket but it might one day). And I really wish it used wifi and not Bluetooth because my bedroom is at the peak of the 100 ft limit so it goes back and forth being connected on my overnight bbq cooks.
customer_reviews.author: Brian L. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Android App Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I can't find the Android app that works with this thermometer. There's an iDevices app in the Play Store, but it doesn't work with this thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Tactibunny

customer_reviews.title: Probes not accurate after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: I have had this product for 2 months now and the probes already have stopped being accurate. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: CrazyToddlersMom

customer_reviews.title: Love this item
customer_reviews.text: Love this item! I have gone trough 2 the thermometers, different brands, decided to try one more and hit the jackpot!!! This is awesome! They though to everything from a round disc that you can wrap the wire to the probe up in so it won't get bent and break to a magnet for the back of the device if you want it on your oven and the mobile/bluetooth app works great!!! Don't hesitate, buy it now!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Thompon

customer_reviews.title: Nice graphs showing temperature profiles vs
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Nice graphs showing temperature profiles vs. time. Cons: Range of connection <8m, can't reach from my grill to the kitchen through a frame wall. Very limited options: Can't scale graphs, or otherwise change the look (and the time labels are tiny), interface is unclear. Bottom line: Will replace with a wireless thermometer. Need the range.
customer_reviews.author: Bad Manor

customer_reviews.title: I feel guilty adding this to a landfill...
customer_reviews.text: It worked correctly once. The only thing to like is the pieces to wrap the cords around do they fit neatly in a drawer.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but missing today’s tech
customer_reviews.text: Works well but I had one that sounds a alarm when desired temperature is reached. You have to watch this one close
customer_reviews.author: My sister calls me Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Always Works
customer_reviews.text: From an operational standpoint this works great. It reads easy, I like the magnet mount and I have had no issues with the unit. It is of much better quality then my Cappec. That being said the App is weak, it does not give you a lot of options on types of food. I sometimes go to other sources to find temps.
customer_reviews.author: Zboatman

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. You can walk away and monitor the temp on your iPhone or iPad.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Check Out All Products in the Line Before Choosing One
customer_reviews.text: This product is great. The interface is easy to use, the temperature readouts are immediate and seem to be accurate, and I have come to trust my cooking to this device. I use it for grilling and I discovered too late that they make a product especially for that application. I recommend you review all of the product choices before settling on any single one.
customer_reviews.author: Robert E. Reinheimer

customer_reviews.title: Most devices like this claim +- up to 3
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after I bought the IGRILL2. This is so simple to use and is very accurate. I supervise a calibration lab and thought I would see just how accurate this is. One degree off. Most devices like this claim +- up to 3. Amazing. It doesn't advertise using the ambient probe, but it I used it and worked fine. You get what you pay for with this one. I bought a Maverick probe and ambient temp device for $75. IGRILL is much better.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Spendy but worth it
customer_reviews.text: Cant believe i didnt get one of these before. Us it inside or outside and never lift the lid until you reach right temp
customer_reviews.author: Crowbar

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic product and their app for the iPhone is very ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product and their app for the iPhone is very stable and reliable. You can set it up to alert you when your food has 10° left to go so that you can make sure to be there when it's ready to be taken off its heat source.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Brown

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly, way better than traditional or even remote thermometers, let's you monitor cooking progress which allows you to adjust oven or heat temperature accordingly. Made a deliciously juicy turkey on the first use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up device.
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm and it frees the chef up to move about the house with the remote monitoring. I check the accuracy of the recorded temperature with another thermometer, and they were identical.
customer_reviews.author: Cross Country Skiing Doc

customer_reviews.title: I've got one of the included probes that works great and the other is now ~10* off after getting ...
customer_reviews.text: My only gripe is that the probes included cannot get wet....at all. Don't dunk it, splash it, or even breath on it too heavily. I've got one of the included probes that works great and the other is now ~10* off after getting hot water splashed on it. Tried putting in bag of rice and it got better but will still need to replace with the 'pro' model probes that are at least water resistant.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: I did not receive any instructions with it, so ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not receive any instructions with it, so I cannot figure out how to install the batteries, I rechecked all the packing, no instructions. I have tried calling iDevice, with no success. I am looking forward to using this product.
customer_reviews.author: petededham

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Makes your oven more accurate for proper cooking
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Makes your oven more accurate for proper cooking. Mounted unit on the wall and now with its bright display I can monitor oven temps from across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with purchase. Used for a variety of items and works well. Love not having to constantly be in the kitchen watching a thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Mac

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I use it for baking and grilling ...
customer_reviews.text: We were always a little hesitant when cooking chicken... not any more! I love this! I use it for baking and grilling meats and it saves so much time!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Temperature is accurate and convienent to check on my phone. I only have one issue and that is wit cleaning the probes. They get dirty pretty quickly and are difficult to scrub clean Other than that, great thermometer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: This product came as advertised and performed as expected. The price was right and I am happy with the performance.
customer_reviews.author: PeteG

customer_reviews.title: It does look like a high quality product
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used this yet. It does look like a high quality product, though. I hope to use it soon to maintain vigil over a smoked brisket.
customer_reviews.author: donosan

customer_reviews.title: Setup was easy, even on his iPhone
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband who is fanatical about cooking meat properly. He LOVES it!! Setup was easy, even on his iPhone. The display itself is sturdy and large and easy to ready. All our meat (especially beef) has been impeccably cooked since I purchased this!!
customer_reviews.author: mcdowde

customer_reviews.title: My med-rare steak looked more like
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but I do not think the temp measured is very accurate. My med-rare steak looked more like medium
customer_reviews.author: Navid Furutan

customer_reviews.title: two different temps (med rare/med) works great.
customer_reviews.text: I use these (2 sensors) for cooking steaks all the time now.... two different temps (med rare/med) works great.
customer_reviews.author: Juanboy2k

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and accurate.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Links with your phone and lets you know when your cooking project is near the target temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Randall McCann

customer_reviews.title: This device exceeded my expectations. My techy teen set ...
customer_reviews.text: This device exceeded my expectations. My techy teen set it up for me on my iPhone. Now once I turn on the device and open the app on my phone it prompts to ask me what I'm cooking. I have found the cooking temps to be accurate every time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just the right temp!
customer_reviews.text: I owned the original which had some bluetooth issues. This one is spectacular. MUCH easier to use.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: This works very well as advertised. It works well ...
customer_reviews.text: This works very well as advertised. It works well from inside my house on the main floor, but not when I am upstairs.
customer_reviews.author: Fiso

customer_reviews.title: Works very nicely for both grill and oven use and connects well ...
customer_reviews.text: Works very nicely for both grill and oven use and connects well with phone app. We have already used this product many times since purchase several weeks ago. So far meat has been done to our likely using the suggested temperatures.
customer_reviews.author: CLL

customer_reviews.title: Works well when not disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: Works well but disconnects from phone too often for more stars.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Worked perfectly for the Thanksgiving day turkey. Time will tell. Pros: easy to use, makes cooking much easier Cons: None so far ...
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: This thin is great! No need to open the cover nor go ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great! No need to open the cover nor go to the grill as I read the temperature on my iPod. It takes care of the saying "If you'r looking you'r not cooking".
customer_reviews.author: John M. Ellgas

customer_reviews.title: The product is OK.
customer_reviews.text: The product is OK. Two small problems Bluetooth connection is problematic from time to time There is no data history
customer_reviews.author: valdim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome ... love this thing. Makes watch temperature on the grill SO much easier.
customer_reviews.author: DogRiverRat

customer_reviews.title: So cool to be able to just set it and forget ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in handy for cooking Thanksgiving turkey. So cool to be able to just set it and forget it, instead of opening the oven, which cools the oven down, to check the temperature.
customer_reviews.author: Chris McLellan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. No more getting up to check on my smoker.
customer_reviews.author: danielwsimmons

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: I use this while smoking on my Brinkman electric smoker. Works great. I could be in bed doing an overnight smoke and I can simply check my phone and see the temperature is fine on my meat.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful Cooking Thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Works well, no flaws. Very helpful for cooking, baking, smoking.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I does just what it says it does. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer D. Tingey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to set up. Worked exactly as it was supposed to work.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: liked the way it worked
customer_reviews.text: Only used it once so far, liked the way it worked!
customer_reviews.author: Mike poz

customer_reviews.title: This is a great tool and we love using it
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool and we love using it. However its 7-10 degrees off. Its shows 165F but when we check in the same location with a traditional thermometer its always shows less. So we got in habit or coking everything 10 degrees past the thermometers reading. So when its beeps ands says "Your food is ready" it's another 5-10 degrees that it'll actually be ready. We had to throw things back on the grill to cook longer several times. The most accurate reading we got so far is for salmon, but that's usually not too thick. Something like tri-tip and turkey is harder to read. Overall great product, but needs some improvement in temp reading.
customer_reviews.author: Olga Sidoran

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy! No Support!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these items last year. The probes stopped working on both units after only a few usages. The control unit started showing crazy high temperatures and was rendered useless. I emailed idevices customer service and was referred to Weber. I called Weber with no reply. I emailed Weber and finally received a call back over 2 weeks later only to find out that the probes go bad and they don't show a replacement probe available! Great! So I'm out over $200 and can't get parts or warranty service. Weber advised me to call Amazon! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Quixotic1

customer_reviews.title: Great product, App needs some work.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. It's nice to be able to watch a graph of the meat temperature over time. The app leaves much to be desired, though. It's not terribly user-friendly. For one the app isn't dedicated to the Kitchen Thermometer, but instead controls all of the iDevices, so if you're only this one thermometer, there are unnecessary and slightly confusing steps involved in using it. Also be warned that the alarm that goes off when your meat is 10 ̊F from reaching its desired temperature is only as loud as the current settings on your phone. If you have the ringer switch turned to vibrate and/or your ringer volume turned down, it could be a sad, char-filled dinner.
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool
customer_reviews.text: So far it works perfectly. Nice to be able to monitor the meat temp. from anywhere. Can't wait for next summer when I can "watch" the brisket cooking on the deck from upstairs. Seems to work much better than the Weber remote thermometer. But its new so we'll see how durable it is... Update 3/6/17: One of the probes stopped working. It was giving readings about 100 degrees too high. I contacted Weber (who I guess now owns iDevices). They immediately responded, asked for further information and within 2 days shipped a replacement. Excellent customer service! I still love this device!
customer_reviews.author: johnrf

customer_reviews.title: Good Thermometer, Don't Bother with the Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: It's a pretty good thermometer, but the Bluetooth/smartphone operation is more trouble than it is worth. iPhone 6 and I have all kinds of trouble getting it to talk with the iGrill. Nothing like putting the meat on the grill and then trying to figure out/download a new version of software. Why not just let the user run the previous version one more time, it's dinner time, not figure out my wireless product time. Grrrr. It's also remarkably annoying that the iGrill app is more concerned with selling you more iDevice products than getting the one you have to work.
customer_reviews.author: Dan Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cook to Perfection!!!
customer_reviews.text: I first saw this on Dr. Oz the week before Thanksgiving. The segment was about your stuffed turkey temp. I didn't know that the stuffing cooked longer than the turkey. I used this thermometer and was able to cook to perfection. I even used it on the ham. Never opened the oven even once. Love that I can move around the house and "check" on my food from my smartphone. I also like the presets and the customizing capabilities. I wanted to use it in the Turkey fryer but wasn't sure that it was made for that. I can't wait to use it again.
customer_reviews.author: Professor TD

customer_reviews.title: Aplus oven thermometer and probe for cooking your meat
customer_reviews.text: Best thermometer easy to set up to your iPhone. I also purchased the oven probe which tells you the temperature of your oven. I have purchased 2 more sets for my parents and friend. Precise temp for your meats so they don't get over cooked I have used many brands like all clad. miu miu etc but you pay for what you get:)
customer_reviews.author: Vancouverite

customer_reviews.title: Cool while it worked properly for a day or so.  App was poor too.
customer_reviews.text: I returned it within a week because the two probes were giving very different readings even while in the same liquid. Also, the app kept crashing repeatedly when I tried to select one of my preset temperature alerts. I had to reset my iPhone each time I used the app. It worked once or twice and that was cool, but reliability overall was lousy.
customer_reviews.author: Bio-Esq

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, for three months
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, for three months. Gives crazy high readings now. I will stick with the Weber going forward.
customer_reviews.author: B. E.

customer_reviews.title: Buy this, I never review and this item is worth my time
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this and I'm really really happy with it. The price is great, the quality is great and it's extremely easy to use. I smoked a turkey yesterday and I didn't have to open my smoker once to tell the meat. I'm thrilled! Thank goodness for whomever decided to invent this clever tech. I'll be buying one for my dad for his birthday soon too!
customer_reviews.author: Asya

customer_reviews.title: Every cook should have one
customer_reviews.text: I'm a vegetarian and know nothing about cooking meat. I do cook meat for other people though. I used this to cook rib eye roast on the BBQ at Christmas and it came out perfect. Amazing. You would have thought a meat eater cooked it! Used one prong to monitor the heat inside BBQ and the other to monitor the meat itself. Low stress cooking! We knew exactly when the roast was done. Highly recommend this magical gadget. You will never spoil an expensive cut of meat ever again :0)
customer_reviews.author: anne j eastap

customer_reviews.title: I love that there are two probes so you can either ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had no issues with this. I love that there are two probes so you can either use it on two sections of your meat of choice or if you are cooking two things in the oven you can do it at the same time. I normally always use the app but the thermometer itself works great too. The app allows you to set up an alert with the type of meat you are cooking and it will alert you to when it is close to being ready. I also like that it shows you a graph of the temperature over time, this has helped me learn my new oven, kinda essential with living in apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Berg

customer_reviews.title: A big help in the kitchen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after seeing a favorable review in Cook's Magazine, and am well pleased with it. Unlike earlier remote thermometers, it is quite accurate. The Bluetooth feature is a bit gimmicky, but I find it nice to follow the progress of my oven roast on my tablet while I relax in the living room. It displays a graphical plot of the internal temperature of the roast with time, so I not only can see the present temperature but by projecting the trend line can predict when it will be done. Nifty!
customer_reviews.author: gusso

customer_reviews.title: Perfect turkey this year without any guessing
customer_reviews.text: Perfect turkey this year without any guessing. Love it. Only complaint is that the instructions in the packaging and on the web site should be clear that you simply PULL the front piece off of the base to install the batteries. I kept trying to twist and couldn't find instructions for this simplest of all things (and the first thing you need to do when you open the product). This is why Apple is so successful, they actually TEST things like this BEFORE shipping the product. How about some instructions iDevices?
customer_reviews.author: Insigniam Performance

customer_reviews.title: On the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to sync with your phone, accepts multiple prongs. I walk all over my house and outside without loosing connection to the device. This has been a game changer for temp specific cooks, I have used it now in both my oven and on the smoker. Accurate within a degree of my other gauges!
customer_reviews.author: D. Bushey

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for those that enjoy cooking or are gadget geeks.
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to our son in law for Christmas 2015. He is a gadget geek who enjoys cooking. He was so excited when he realized what it was he stopped opening other gifts to examine it. Can't comment on its success in using but haven't heard one complaint from him about it. It appears well made.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2 of these for presents last year for 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for presents last year for 2 of my children. They have been used very little and already one of the meat probes has failed this Thanksgiving. It reads a constant 212 F. Whether used a little or a lot should not matter. The thermocouples should not fail and should be able to provide many years of service.
customer_reviews.author: SVF

customer_reviews.title: I still haven't found any type thermometer that works perfectly ...
customer_reviews.text: I still haven't found any type thermometer that works perfectly for me. Have tried 4 different types and this one works about as well as any of them. I still find that I have to cook my poultry a little longer (20-30 min) longer than the device advises. Works perfectly for rare and medium rare steak.
customer_reviews.author: A. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Initial power up requires Weber Customer Service call!
customer_reviews.text: Product requires a call to Weber Customer Service to activate. Enclosed instructions in packaging remains erroneous & applies to the (4 year ago) previous manufacturer, preventing initial power up via proprietary “app”.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Great thermometer
customer_reviews.text: Great thermometer! Received as a gift, and couldn't be happier. I use it on the grill for smoking all our favorite foods. It is easily programmed through the APP, and beeps when your selected temperature is reached.
customer_reviews.author: J.T.

customer_reviews.title: Junk product.
customer_reviews.text: Used 3 times and now my probes are reading 150-200 degrees when plugged in and not cooking. Do not purchase this thermometer!
customer_reviews.author: Chris A.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my wife. It works very well. We are both learning to cook with a thermometer, and it seems to be making us better cooks. When we are not using it, I stick it on the side of the fridge with the magnet on the bottom. I like that feature, especially since it's a decent looking device.
customer_reviews.author: hlper

customer_reviews.title: Works great, I have seen the same thermometer with a ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great, I have seen the same thermometer with a different brand name ( identical) on sale for more than the cost of this one. Great value! I use it with my pellet smoker and have also used it indoors in my conventional oven. No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Beardall

customer_reviews.title: cool looking but not very functional
customer_reviews.text: cool looking but not very functional, due to lousy range of bluetooth and impossible task I had to customize settings -- I gave up trying to guess. Many better products out there (search BBQ)-- not as pretty, and the best are not easy to program yetdoable, but they perform really well.
customer_reviews.author: seymour miles

customer_reviews.title: works as intended and is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: We use it for grilling; works as intended and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie G Chounet

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and I bought this for my husband for ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I bought this for my husband for Father's Day. He wasn't sure about it when he first opened it, but now that he has used it he really loves it! He has already used it several times, and has even taken it with him on a family trip.
customer_reviews.author: ShariFromTX

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this thermometer! Does a great job! The app is also very easy to use. I did have a problem with one of the probes, and IDevices replaced the probe immediately. Very good customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Great product. You will never go back to instant-read ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. You will never go back to instant-read style thermometers. Terrific iPhone app.
customer_reviews.author: Roquie

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: This worked like a charm for my standing rib roast!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Keeps me from peeking
customer_reviews.text: A bit tricky until I got used to it, but the support from iDevices was outstanding. It has kept me from constantly checking the grill, which is a no-no for effective grilling. ("If you're lookin', you ain't cookin'")
customer_reviews.author: JohnBike

customer_reviews.title: This has been great for everything we bake
customer_reviews.text: This has been great for everything we bake, especially poultry. I like being able to stick food in the oven, cook to just above the recommended temperature and not have to worry about it being dry or check on it during cooking. The iDevices Kitchen Thermometer allows me to multitask
customer_reviews.author: Mike Segraves

customer_reviews.title: Good But Flaky Probe
customer_reviews.text: Cool product, but, one of the probes crapped out after 3 uses. Amazon replaced the whole thing. Here's hoping the second one lasts lots longer.
customer_reviews.author: chw88

customer_reviews.title: You download the phone app from igrill, not iDevices
customer_reviews.text: Works great. I watch the temperature from my phone, from inside the house now. I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jim & Michelle Eoff

customer_reviews.title: Well done.
customer_reviews.text: Love this kitchen thermometer. The readout attaches to my phone. I can walk out of the kitchen and still now how the cooking is progressing.
customer_reviews.author: Contracuti

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised. Very handy addition to cooking tools.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. The dual probe feature allows me to monitor food and grill temperature at the same time. It's also nice to be able to monitor food from inside house.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog5035

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not always accurate and I can t understand why Replaced the sensor/wires but still seems to read hot
customer_reviews.author: ExecRecruiter

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great. Monitor the progress of your meat from the ...
customer_reviews.text: This thing is great. Monitor the progress of your meat from the comfort of your family room. Works perfectly every time.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Ford

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely the BEST!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this meat thermometer!!! Bought 2 more for my daughters!
customer_reviews.author: Debra Miguel

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and accurate but a little finicky
customer_reviews.text: The battery door is very hard to remove, pull apart hard, don't try to twist it! The app is a little too complicated but has never crashed.

customer_reviews.title: Temperature is lower than reading
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. It shows consistently about 8 degrees more than it should when used side by side with several other thermometers.

customer_reviews.author: marie simmons

customer_reviews.title: One lady in customer service was very nice, but with the history I've had with this ...
customer_reviews.text: This appear to have very cheap componets as I've had four of five replacement probes and all fail quickly. While having both probes in the same piee of meat, the device will show two different temperatures, one of which could be 50 to 100 degrees different. I've had so many replacement probes I can only assume they use the cheapest componets available. One lady in customer service was very nice, but with the history I've had with this product, I'd never recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Probably the best wireless thermometer you can buy
customer_reviews.text: definitely better than all the other RF models i've tried over the years

customer_reviews.title: Surprised and pleased her, and she was even able to install ...
customer_reviews.text: Christmas gift for Mom, the lady who "already has everything". Surprised and pleased her, and she was even able to install the app herself. Overall and excellent item as a gift. Well-made, shipped fast, and a surprise - what more could I ask?

product_meta.title: iDevices Kitchen Thermometer
product_meta.description: iDevices Kitchen Thermometer, White/Chrome, 8.45" x 8.75" x 2.7"
feature_bullets: Dual probe capacity to simultaneously track two temperatures whether you're cooking a full turkey or two separate pieces of meat
The Kitchen thermometer measures temperatures between -22° F (-30°C) to 572° F (300°C)
150 foot Bluetooth smart range; 150 hour battery life
One year limited warranty for device and 90 day warranty for meat probe
